title: John McVay, Key Figure in the Making of a 49ers Dynasty, Dies at 91
description: He rebounded from the humiliation of “the fumble” as coach of the ’78 New York Giants to help San Francisco win five Super Bowls over 14 seasons as a top team executive.
dc:creator: Richard Goldstein
media:credit: Michael Zagaris/San Francisco 49ers via Getty Images
media:description: John McVay in 2013 at his induction into the San Francisco 49ers Hall of Fame.
